overview: With the global shut-down of the pandemic we are reminded how important it is to spend time outdoors with friends having fun.  This film is a balance of personal action segments and location/story-based segments that not only show progressive skiing but interesting stories. Grab a beer, some popcorn and yell “Huck Yeah!’ with the most fun ski movie of 2020. Dropping in September of 2020.
title: Huck Yeah!
